It is a federal crime to open a piece of junk mail thats addressed to someone else. Listening to someone elses phone call without a court order can also be a federal crime.

articles.title: Premier League: What’s wrong with Pep Guardiola’s Manchester City? Nothing, as seen in 3-1 victory over Leicester City

articles.content:
